page.title: 02A Sunday with Sally's family
page.content: I woke up at 8.00 and got dressed. Then I went downstairs for a breakfast of toast and peanut butter. It is church day, therefore my Mum took my sister and myself by car. We drove past fields and hedges until we got to{Paulton Catholic Church.}When Church was finished, we went home. Dad had been busy packing a picnic, and he said that we would go{strawberry {picking.}We went picking at{Cheddar {Gorge.}I ate most of the strawberries we picked and they were lovely. Later, we had a picnic in the{Mendip {Hills.}After that we drove home and all had a game of tennis in the back garden. Dad won all the games. I was by this time very tired, so just before going to bed I had a hot bath.
